Document.title: Document
Document.description:
Contains the document payload to be included inside an Envelope.

The document must contain a `$schema` property that identifies
the data's structure otherwise it will be rejected.

$schema.title: JSON Schema ID
$schema.description: Schema identifies the schema that should be used to understand this document

head.title: Header
head.description: Details on what the contents are

sigs.title: Signatures
sigs.description: JSON Web Signatures of the header

Envelope.description: Envelope wraps around a document adding headers and digital signatures.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique UUIDv1 identifier for the envelope.

dig.title: Digest
dig.description: Digest of the canonical JSON body.

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Seals of approval from other organisations.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Set of labels that describe but have no influence on the data.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional semi-structured information about this envelope.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any information that may be relevant to other humans about this envelope

draft.title: Draft
draft.description: When true, implies that this document should not be considered final. Digital signatures are optional.

Header.description: Header defines the metadata of the body.
